title: Error when starting up thunderbird
content:
I get this error when I start up Thunderbird on my Desktop PC but not on my Laptop.

Mozilla Thunderbird ESR

Thunderbird The current operation on 'INBOX' did not succeed. The mail server for account sotackd@gmail.com responded: [NONEXISTENT] Unknown

However once this is cleared my Gmail and Thunderbird work perfectly.

Please see attached info.
creator: sotackd

title: Calendar event reminder display size
content: Calendar event reminders show in a full page. How do I revert it to an adjustable size (vertical and horizontal)?
creator: abenton

title: DesktopThunderbird
content: when trying to compose email the program freez
creator: gbioisb

title: Setting up mail.com account in TB
content:
When I set up an account pointing to mail.com, TB finds the server setup without a problem. It fails to authenticate the log-in at the mail.com server. I've tried every setting using those provided by mail.com and searching the internet, IMAP and POP3. Nothing works. The initial authorization fails with every permutation of settings.

HELP please.
creator: 628dcox

title: Thunderbird emails disapear
content: Within the last couple of days, while using Thunderbird, my list of unread emails disappears and I get a box that pops up that says: "The folder 'inbox on johnking2@comcast.net' could not be compacted because writing to folder failed. Verify that you have enough disc space, and that you have write privileges to the file system, then try again." If I click OK, my list of emails returns for a short while. I have no idea what to do, as nothing has changed, that I am aware of. I have a SD hard drive with about 17% space available. This is on a Dell laptop with i7 processor. Please help!
creator: johnking2@comcast.net

title: Thunderbird
content: How to import my outlook address book from Outlook to Thunderbird
creator: daverobinson478

title: IMAP, alcune dir sono ignorate durante il sync con il server
content: Il provider è posteo.net, quando avviene il sync con il server, delle dir (non so dire con certezza se solo alcune o tutte) non vengono aggiornate. Per ottenere l'aggiornamento devo entrare nella dir e da li richiede l'aggiornamento. Così facendo i nuovi messaggi vengono scaricati.
creator: nulll

title: cancellazione email
content: Buongiorno, il problema è il seguente: Nonostante nelle opzioni "politiche di conservazione" della cartella posta in arrivo risulti flaggata la cancellazione delle email più vecchie di "3 giorni" in realtà non le cancella, lo fa regolarmente in quella "spam" e "inviate" . Ho provato a cancellare e reimpostare l'account e reimpostargli nuovamente tutti i parametri ma nulla da fare. Il suddetto problema, lo fa, a onor del vero, da circa 6 - 7 mesi. prima no. la versione di Thunderbird è la 139.0.2 (64bit) scaricata direttamente dal sito ufficiale e aggiornata regolarmente. Grazie e Buona giornata
creator: ramesseii

title: Card Scanner that's usable with Thunderbird
content: I am looking for an app that I can use to scan business cards, where the output can be easily imported into my Thunderbird address book. Any environment will serve, though I would prefer something that is available in Linux, Windows 10 and Android versions. I really need to free up some real estate on my desk, and getting rid of stacks of business cards would solve most of that problem.
creator: Pluschap
